name: Mine Oak Logs
notes: Use (params.count) to determine what 'X' item count should be. Verify inventory ensures items are actually picked up.

steps.title: Mine Oak Logs
steps.details: Mine 'X' amount of oak_log. (Recommended for pipeline: 3 oak logs).

steps.title: Verify Oak Logs
steps.details: Check inventory for 'X' amount of oak_log. This verifies you have picked them up.
